name: Ivydale
description: Ivydale is a boutique executive coaching practice that supports leaders to deliver positive impact.  Ivydale works with sustainability leaders on a one-to-one or group basis to deliver on sustainability commitments.  Clients include Fortune 100 companies, investors, government, and start-ups. Ivydale also supports sustainability transformation through a digital platform to build in-house sustainability capabilities.
